top.title: US and UK pulling some personnel from Qatar military base
top.summary: US officials say it is a "precautionary measure" and comes as Donald Trump weighs up whether to take action against Iran.

top.title: Starlink reportedly made free in Iran - but protesters are taking huge risks by using it
top.summary: The satellite technology has become a vital communications lifeline after the government shut down the internet last week.

top.title: Denmark warns of 'fundamental disagreement' after White House talks on Greenland
top.summary: There was no major breakthrough during the meeting, and President Trump reiterated his interest in acquiring the island shortly afterwards.

top.title: X to stop Grok AI from undressing images of real people after backlash
top.summary: Grok will no longer allow users to remove clothing from images of real people, a statement posted on X reads.

top.title: No 10 welcomes reports X is addressing Grok deepfakes
top.summary: The use of the AI tool to digitally undress women has sparked a backlash as well as intervention from the government and regulator.

top.title: Honey, I shrunk the data centres: Is small the new big?
top.summary: Huge data centres are being built to handle AI computing but some experts say they aren't necessary.

title.#text: The best e-reader to buy right now
X claims it has stopped Grok from undressing people, but of course it hasn’t
The Stream Deck Plus is back to its lowest price
